auth_domain.description: The unique subdomain assigned to your Zero Trust organization.

auto_redirect_to_identity.description: When set to `true`, users skip the identity provider selection step during login.

is_ui_read_only.description: Lock all settings as Read-Only in the Dashboard, regardless of user permission. Updates may only be made via the API or Terraform for this account when enabled.

background_color.description: The background color on your login page.

footer_text.description: The text at the bottom of your login page.

header_text.description: The text at the top of your login page.

logo_path.description: The URL of the logo on your login page.

text_color.description: The text color on your login page.

name.description: The name of your Zero Trust organization.

ui_read_only_toggle_reason.description: A description of the reason why the UI read only field is being toggled.
ui_read_only_toggle_reason.example: Temporarily turn off the UI read only lock to make a change via the UI

user_seat_expiration_inactive_time.description: The amount of time a user seat is inactive before it expires. When the user seat exceeds the set time of inactivity, the user is removed as an active seat and no longer counts against your Teams seat count. Must be in the format `300ms` or `2h45m`. Valid time units are: `ns`, `us` (or `Âµs`), `ms`, `s`, `m`, `h`.
